ingredients.ingredient: 10 slices smoked turkey, cut into thin strips
½ cup sour cream, for topping

cookingTips: Warm tortillas slightly before filling to improve pliability and prevent tearing
Add avocado just before serving to prevent browning and oxidation
Layer ingredients strategically with protein in the center for easier rolling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to prevent tortillas from tearing? How should you arrange ingredients for easy rolling?
